name: VR Violin - Hackathon 2020
summary: First Attempt at making a VR Violin. We are trying to make a VR Violin. Control the bow with the right hand. Touch the strings with the left hand fingers and base on how close they are to you the pitch will change. We created this during a weekend for the Hand Tracking Hackathon. We plan on improving this in future updates. We would like to add more features to help people actually learn the basics of playing the violin.
